short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Charity extension which donate it's revenue to USO charity organizations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Help Ukraine by downloading the "USO" extension and start searching through your address bar or new tab.
This extension will take over your new tab and replace it with yahoo search engine
